## matterTypes.Api.select() method

Opens a matter type picker to multi-select matter types. Returns the selected matter type ids.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
select(request: SelectMatterTypesRequest): Promise<string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [SelectMatterTypesRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.mattertypes.selectmattertypesrequest.md) | set default location for matter types picker. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;

selected matter types.

## Example


```
const request: SelectMatterTypesRequest = {
 defaultLocationId: 'NSW'
}
const matterTypeIds = await sdk.matterTypes.select(request);
```
